name: Lantern Glare
text: Like an archon’s aura, the light of your thrown weapons can shake even the fiercest of foes.
prerequisites: Lantern Light, Lantern Style, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, good or lawful alignment, caster level 11th or monk level 11th.
benefit: Creatures you hit with a thrown weapon as well as creatures within 20 feet of your target must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + half your character level + your Charisma modifier) or become shaken until they damage you or 24 hours have passed. A creature that succeeds at its saving throw or that damages you after becoming shaken becomes immune to this effect for 24 hours.
text_zh: 如同亚空神使的灵光一般，你投掷武器的光芒可以撼动哪怕最凶恶的敌人。
prerequisites_zh: 流光闪，流光式，近距射击，精准射击，守序或善良阵营，施法者等级11级或武僧等级11。
benefit_zh: 你使用投掷武器击中的生物及其周围20尺内的生物除非通过意志豁免检定（DC=10+角色等级的一半+魅力加值）否则陷入战栗状态，直到对你造成伤害或着经过24小时为止。成功通过豁免检定或者在陷入战栗状态后对你造成过伤害的生物在24小时内对此效果免疫。
